name: CDAC (Chinese Development Assistance Council)
mission: To uplift lower-income Chinese families through educational, financial, and social programs.

name: MENDAKI (Council for the Development of Singapore Malay/Muslim Community)
mission: To support the educational and socio-economic advancement of the Malay/Muslim community.

name: Eurasian Association
mission: To preserve and promote Eurasian heritage and provide support for education and social causes.
programs: Social assistance for families in need

name: TCC (The Tamil Language and Cultural Society)
mission: To promote the Tamil language, culture, and heritage in Singapore.

name: Sikh Welfare Council (SIKH COUNCIL)
mission: To provide welfare and social support to members of the Sikh community and beyond.
programs: Community support for elderly and disadvantaged individuals
